articles.description: Joe Cullen says opponent Mensur Suljovic's slow style of play is akin to cheating after the 32nd seed was knocked out of the world championship.

articles.description: Morgan Rogers shows his importance to Aston Villa with two goals in a win over Manchester United, as Unai Emery's side remain in the title hunt.

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says his players will be weighed when they return to training to check they are fit enough to play against Nottingham Forest.

articles.description: American Lindsey Vonn claims her fourth podium finish in five World Cup races this winter, ahead of the 2026 Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn third at Val d'Isere for fourth podium finish in five World Cup races

articles.description: Manchester United's injury problems worsened as captain and talisman Bruno Fernandes was replaced in a 2-1 defeat by Aston Villa.

articles.description: Liverpool fear Alexander Isak has sustained a significant lower leg injury after the striker was forced off against Tottenham on Saturday.

articles.description: Hearts "have arrived" as Scottish Premiership title contenders after beating Rangers for the second time this season, says Kris Boyd.
